Name: Aqua Tie
LongDescription: Boosts the maximum HP. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Squirtle, Wartortle, and Blastoise.  You can get an Aqua Tie at the Croagunk Swap Shop by swapping: a Squirt-Foam, a Squirt-Card, and a Water-Guard. That's the easy way!  An item with a ☆☆☆-rarity rating is very hard to get. It's beyond valuable!
